thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Gil Ben-Haroch

author: Gil Ben-Haroch
title: Gil Ben-Haroch
text:
I had a good experience with the team and would consider applying for other policies through them. They simplify the process and are there to answer questions and take you step by step.
Very responsive to emails and easy to reach by phone which is a big contrast to when you have to contact insurance companies directly to go through an application process.
